sentence: Since  the  Hamas  attack  that  killed  at  least  1,400  Israelis,  the  majority  of  them  civilians,  more  than  7,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  retaliatory  Israeli  airstrikes,  according  to  the  health  ministry  in  Gaza.

Since  the  Hamas  attack  that  killed  at  least  1,400  Israelis,  the  majority  of  them  civilians,  more  than  7,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  retaliatory  Israeli  airstrikes,  according  to  the  health  ministry  in  Gaza.
Upward  of  2,700  of  the  dead  are  children.
